sn22.98:1.2: Seated to one side, that mendicant said to the Buddha:
sn22.98:1.3: “Sir, is there any form at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever?
sn22.98:1.7: consciousness at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever?”
sn22.98:1.8: “Mendicant, there is no form at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.
sn22.98:1.12: consciousness at all that’s permanent, everlasting, eternal, imperishable, and will last forever and ever.”
